C

Conditions - Class in info.smart_tools.smartactors.core.postgres_schema.search
A set of methods to correctly write down select conditions like AND or OR in the SQL queries.
count(QueryStatement, CollectionName, IObject) - Static method in class info.smart_tools.smartactors.core.postgres_schema.PostgresSchema
Fills the statement body and it's list of parameter setters with the collection name and WHERE clause for the SELECT COUNT(*) statement to count the documents in the collection.
create(QueryStatement, CollectionName, IObject) - Static method in class info.smart_tools.smartactors.core.postgres_schema.PostgresSchema
Fills the statement body with the CREATE TABLE sentence and CREATE INDEX sentences to create the desired collection and it's indexes.
